name: Monkey Business (itch)
description:
Our teams attempt at TOJam9.

Controls

SpaceBar to Jump.

G to Dash.

You are a zoo keeper living in peace. But one day a malicious monkey revolts against you and heads for the streets. Now it's up to you to bring him back to justice! (Actually, just the zoo.)

(Game is broken. Refresh the page to play again.)
